title: Porsche 911 Carrera S unveiled globally - EVO India
summary:
Porsche 911 Carrera S Unveiled Globally

Published on: 09 Jan 2025, 06:48

Porsche has unveiled the new 911 Carrera S, which is now part of the 911 lineup and available in both coupe and convertible body styles. This model features a more powerful engine and additional equipment compared to the standard Carrera.

  • The Carrera S is positioned between the Carrera and Carrera GTS models.
  • The new sports car is based on the design of previous 911 Turbo models, with minor design changes like staggered 20/21-inch wheels and Matrix LED headlights.
  • The interior includes a standard black leather package, optional rear seats for the coupe, and advanced tech features like a wireless phone charger.
  • The 3-litre twin-turbo engine produces 473bhp and 530Nm of torque, with capabilities of 0 to 100 km/h in 3.3 seconds and a top speed of 308 km/h.
  • Expect pricing for the Carrera S to exceed ₹2 crore in India.
Porsche has fitted new turbochargers and has extensively optimised the charge-air cooling.

This unveiling marks an exciting addition to Porsche's 911 lineup, promising both performance and luxury for sports car enthusiasts.

title: Apple could launch iPhone SE 4, new iPad models in April: What to expect - Business Standard
summary:
Apple could launch iPhone SE 4, new iPad models in April

Publication Date: N/A Source: Bloomberg

Apple's first launch of 2025 is expected to be in April with the introduction of the fourth-generation iPhone SE and new iPad models.

  • The new iPhone SE is expected to feature a modern design and significant updates.
  • Mark Gurman from Bloomberg indicates that the devices will launch before the release of iOS 18.4, likely by April.
  • The iPhone SE 4 will reportedly have the A18 chip, 8GB of RAM, and storage starting at 128GB.
  • Camera improvements include a 48MP rear sensor and a 12MP front camera, with a battery capacity increase from 2,018mAh to 3,279mAh.
  • The new iPads anticipated include the 11th-generation base iPad and an updated iPad Air featuring an M3 chip.
“The new iPads and iPhone SE replacement are being developed on the iOS 18.3 train... they’ll launch before iOS 18.4, by April if all goes to plan.” - Mark Gurman

In conclusion, Apple fans may look forward to significant updates in the iPhone SE and iPad lines by April 2025.
newTitle: Apple could launch iPhone SE 4 and new iPad models in April

title: Oppo Reno 13, Reno 13 Pro launching today in India: Know what to expect - Hindustan Times
Apple’s iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2 released: Calculator function restored, bug fixes and more | Mint - Mint
summary:
Apple’s iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2 released: Calculator function restored, bug fixes and more

Publication Date: March 2023

Source: Business Today

Cupertino-based Apple has reportedly released iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2, offering a glimpse at the upcoming software update.

According to a report, the latest beta introduces minor enhancements aimed at refining the user experience, including a key update to the Calculator app and several bug fixes.

  • Calculator Feature Restored: The beta restores a previously removed function, allowing users to repeat calculations by pressing the equals button.
  • Expanding Home App Functionality: Continued development for integrating compatible robot vacuums into the Home app.
  • Bug Fixes and Performance Enhancements: A focus on essential bug fixes and optimizations for a smoother user experience.
  • How to Access the Update: Existing public beta users can install it via Settings > Software Update; new users must enroll in the Beta Software Programme.
  • What Lies Ahead: iOS 18.3 is expected to be less feature-heavy, with more significant features anticipated in the upcoming iOS 18.4 release.

For those keen to explore the latest changes, iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2 provides a chance to test refinements ahead of the full release.
newTitle: Apple’s iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2 released: Calculator function restored, bug fixes and more

title: Poco X7 series launching today: Expected Indian prices, leaked specifications and everything we know so far | Mint - Mint
summary:
Poco X7 Series Launch Today: Expected Prices and Specifications

Publication Date: January 9

Source: LiveMint

Poco is preparing to launch its highly anticipated Poco X7 Series today, which promises significant improvements in the mid-range smartphone market, featuring the Poco X7 and Poco X7 Pro.

The Poco X7 Series aims to deliver high performance at an affordable price, catering to users looking for efficiency in demanding tasks.

Key Points:

  • Unique design with a Black and Yellow dual-tone color scheme.
  • Poco X7 Pro includes a vertically aligned dual-camera, while the X7 features a square camera module.
  • Iron Man Edition of the Poco X7 Pro available in red and gold.
  • Poco X7 Pro powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8300 Ultra with a 6550mAh battery and 90W fast charging.
  • Poco X7 expected to have a 1.5K 3D curved AMOLED display, 120Hz refresh rate, and a 50MP primary sensor.
  • Pricing speculated to be under ₹30,000 for Poco X7 Pro and below ₹25,000 for standard Poco X7.
“The Poco X7 Series is aimed at delivering high-performance capabilities at an affordable price.”

In conclusion, the Poco X7 series is set to make a significant impact in the smartphone market, offering advanced features at competitive prices.
newTitle: Poco X7 Series Launch Today: Expected Prices and Specifications

Oppo Reno 13 series to launch in India today: Price, specs and everything we know - India Today
summary:
Oppo Reno 13 series launches in India today

Published On: Jan 9, 2025
Source: Unnati Gusain

The Oppo Reno 13 series is officially launching in India today, featuring two models: the Reno 13 and the Reno 13 Pro, with notable differences in battery capacity and camera specifications.

  • The Reno 13 Pro boasts a 5800mAh battery, while the vanilla variant has a 5600mAh battery.
  • A live stream of the launch is available on Oppo's official YouTube channel at 5 pm today.
  • The series emphasizes AI-driven features and premium design with an aerospace-grade aluminum frame.
  • It will be the first in India to use the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset.
  • Pre-orders start today, with detailed sale information to follow.
  • The expected starting price for the Reno 13 is Rs 37,999.
"These smartphones will be the first in India to be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset."

The launch of the Oppo Reno 13 series marks an important step in expanding Oppo's premium smartphone offerings in India.
newTitle: Oppo Reno 13 Series Launches in India Today: Key Details and Prices

New-age stock brokers feel pinch of marketing costs - The Economic Times
summary:
New-age Stock Brokers Face Rising Marketing Costs Amid IPO Buzz

Publication Date: Not specified in the article
Source: Economic Times

The cost of acquiring customers has surged for new-age stockbrokers due to increased bidding rates for Google keywords, exacerbated by a growing interest in IPOs.

  • Stockbrokers are competing for keywords on platforms like Google and YouTube.
  • Bidding rates have doubled, increasing the cost of user acquisition for zero-commission brokers.
  • Key terms such as ‘demat account’ have seen significant price increases.
  • Regulatory changes have pushed brokers to refocus on app downloads rather than influencer marketing.
  • Most brokers are heavily investing in SEO and content creation to attract users.
“Digital marketing costs have shot up over the last year...getting customers to download the app on Google Play Store has gone up significantly.” - Sougata Basu, CashRich

This trend signals a major shift in how stock brokers must navigate customer acquisition as competition deepens in a relatively small trading market.
newTitle: New-age Stock Brokers Face Rising Marketing Costs Amid IPO Buzz

title: [CES 2025] Beyond the Home: Samsung Expands AI for a Smarter World - Samsung Global Newsroom
[CES 2025] Beyond the Home: Samsung Expands AI for a Smarter World - Samsung Global Newsroom
[CES 2025] Beyond the Home: Samsung Expands AI for a Smarter World - samsung.com
summary:
Samsung Expands AI for a Smarter World at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Samsung Newsroom

At CES 2025, Samsung revealed its vision for AI technologies that extend beyond the home, exploring innovative solutions across various sectors.

  • Introduction of SmartThings for Cars, Ships, and various AI solutions to enhance community experiences.
  • Demonstrations of AI B2B solutions in the SmartThings Pro zone aimed at optimizing industries like hospitality and office spaces.
  • AI Residence features to improve health monitoring and safety in community spaces.
  • Retail transformation showcased through Samsung’s Visual eXperience Transformation platform.
  • SmartThings Energy presented sustainable living technologies, including solar integration.
  • Innovations in maritime technologies highlighted under SmartThings for Ships.
  • Social initiatives emphasized the importance of accessibility and global education programs.
“As someone active on social media, I want to spread the word that Samsung SmartThings offers practical solutions for energy savings and connectivity,” said Erick “Alexander” Vargas, an attendee from Mexico.

Samsung’s efforts at CES 2025 showcase its commitment to using AI to drive societal transformation and sustainable futures.
newTitle: Samsung Expands AI for a Smarter World at CES 2025

SpaceX to launch Starship megarocket's Flight 7 test mission on Jan. 13 - Space.com
summary:
SpaceX to Launch Starship Megarocket's Flight 7 Test Mission on Jan. 13

Publication Date: January 8, 2024 Source: Space.com

SpaceX's Starship will fly for the seventh time early next week, with a scheduled lift-off on January 13 at 5 p.m. EST (2200 GMT) from Starbase in Texas.

  • Starship is a 400-foot-tall fully reusable megarocket aimed at lunar and Martian exploration.
  • The upcoming mission will attempt to deploy 10 mock satellites for the first time.
  • Flight 7 will feature reused hardware, including a Raptor engine from a previous flight.
  • The mission follows several previous flights, with the last six flights completed successfully.
"The Starlink simulators will be on the same suborbital trajectory as Starship, with splashdown targeted in the Indian Ocean," SpaceX stated.

The upcoming Flight 7 is part of a busy schedule in space exploration, including the launch of Blue Origin's New Glenn rocket and a Falcon 9 mission shortly after.
newTitle: SpaceX to Launch Starship Megarocket's Flight 7 Test Mission on Jan. 13

title: Steam Ate Microsoft's Lunch On PC, It's About To Do The Same On Handhelds - Kotaku
summary:
Steam Ate Microsoft's Lunch On PC, It's About To Do The Same On Handhelds

Publication Date: N/A Source: Kotaku

The Steam Deck, a handheld gaming device by Valve, has become a game changer in the gaming industry, primarily driven by its user-friendly SteamOS, which has drawn many players away from traditional Windows-based gaming.

  • The Steam Deck launched in February 2022 and has quickly transformed the handheld gaming landscape.
  • SteamOS allows for easy game installation and usage, making it appealing to non-PC gamers.
  • Valve plans to expand SteamOS across numerous devices, further solidifying its market position.
  • Microsoft has not effectively entered the portable gaming PC market, losing potential to Valve.
“Microsoft had a chance to compete with Valve in the handheld gaming space. Instead, it just...didn’t.”

This marks a significant moment in handheld gaming, with SteamOS likely to dominate as the preferred platform for portable gaming in the near future.
newTitle: Steam Dominates the Handheld Gaming Market, Leaving Microsoft Behind

title: Implications of Apple AI generating false news summaries - TechTarget
summary:
Implications of Apple AI Generating False News Summaries

Publication Date: January 8, 2025 Source: Informa TechTarget

Apple is addressing issues with its Apple Intelligence system after it generated inaccurate news summaries that misrepresented information from reputable news sources.

  • Apple's AI generated a false summary that included erroneous claims about a news story involving a murder.
  • The BBC and other publications notified Apple about the inaccuracies.
  • Apple is working on an update to acknowledge AI-generated summaries.
  • This issue highlights broader concerns regarding generative AI and misinformation.

The inaccuracies could have legal implications for Apple and raise concerns about the reliability of generative AI.
newTitle: Implications of Apple AI Generating False News Summaries

Date: January 07, 2025
Source: Press Release

ASUS Republic of Gamers has unveiled the much-anticipated 2025 Zephyrus G series laptops, featuring cutting-edge hardware for gamers and creators alike.

  • Equipped with the latest NVIDIA GeForce RTX Laptop GPUs and next-gen AMD and Intel processors.
  • Optimized cooling systems designed for peak thermal efficiency.
  • ROG Nebula Displays featuring OLED panels for stunning visuals.
  • Lightweight and portable designs perfect for on-the-go gaming.
“The 2025 series is ready to exceed those expectations with the latest NVIDIA GeForce RTX Laptop GPUs.”

The new Zephyrus G series raises the bar in ultraportable gaming laptops with impressive specs and performance features.
newTitle: ASUS Republic of Gamers Unveils 2025 Zephyrus G14 and G16 Gaming Laptops

title: Q3 results preview: Irdai's revised norms to weigh on life insurers' margin - Business Standard
summary:
Q3 Results Preview: Irdai's Revised Norms Impact Life Insurers' Margins

Publication Date: Jan 08 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The upcoming financial quarter is expected to present challenges for life insurers due to revised regulations and increased costs.

  • New surrender value norms and higher acquisition costs are anticipated to negatively impact margins.
  • There may be a slowdown in sales through bancassurance, affecting overall performance.
  • Key regulatory changes include revisions to GST rates and potential amendments to the Insurance Act.
newTitle: Q3 Results Preview: Irdai's Revised Norms Impact Life Insurers' Margins

title: iPhone SE 4 launch timeline tipped by Gurman, debunking January rumours | Mint - Mint
summary:
iPhone SE 4 Launch Timeline Confirmed for April 2025

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Live Mint

Apple's fourth-generation iPhone SE is expected to be released by April 2025, contrary to previous rumors of a January launch.

Key Points

  • Mark Gurman, an industry expert, confirmed the April timeline.
  • The device will feature a 6.1-inch LTPS OLED display and a new A18 chip.
  • It is expected to have a 48MP rear camera and 12MP front camera.
  • Pricing is anticipated to be under $500.
“If all goes to plan, Cupertino-based Apple is now planning a release by April.”

The anticipated launch of the iPhone SE 4 marks a continuation of Apple's trend of spring releases for its SE line.
newTitle: iPhone SE 4 Launch Timeline Confirmed for April 2025

title: The Time for an Xbox Handheld Is Now - CNET
summary:
The Time for an Xbox Handheld Is Now

Date: January 2025 Source: CNET

Microsoft is poised to enhance the Windows gaming handheld experience, as there are already several capable devices available. The company needs to accelerate its efforts to make these devices feel more like Xboxes, integrating Xbox-like experiences to attract gamers.

  • Increasing number of Windows gaming handhelds presented at CES 2025.
  • Devices from manufacturers like Lenovo, Acer, MSI, and Asus are on the market.
  • Microsoft admits the need for a seamless Xbox experience on Windows handhelds.
  • Phil Spencer indicates future plans to optimize Windows for handheld gaming.
  • Comparison with Steam Deck’s success highlights the potential for Microsoft.
“Our goal is to put the player and their library at the center of the experience and not all the [Windows] work that you have to do today.” - Jason Ronald, Microsoft

The future of handheld gaming hinges on Microsoft’s ability to unify Xbox and Windows experiences, particularly with new devices like the Lenovo Legion Go S entering the market.
newTitle: The Time for an Xbox Handheld Is Now
